subject: Soccer
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Alex Morgan scored on a header with 30 seconds left in extra time to give the United States women’s soccer team a 4-3 victory and a spot in the Olympic gold-medal match against Japan.
snippet: Alex Morgan scored on a header with 30 seconds left in extra time to give the United States women’s soccer team a 4-3 victory and a spot in the Olympic gold-medal match against Japan.
